title: Teslaâ€™s missing Cybertruck is a problem for the EV revolution
description: Tesla's Cybertruck offering has shifted, leaving only expensive models, signaling issues in producing affordable EVs. This mirrors broader struggles in the US electric vehicle market, with companies like Ford, Rivian, and Lucid grappling with high production costs and weak demand, impacting profitability and market growth.
